alert.note: Alert for Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 10:59PM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM SUNDAY TO 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 2 to 5 inches. Greater amounts across the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Areas of blowing snow with reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected during the day Sunday into Sunday night. Areas of blowing snow are possible during this period.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
